changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.sql: create or replace view os_container_hierarchy_view as select h.descendent_id as container_id, group_concat(distinct a.name order by a.identifier separator ' -> ') as hierarchy from os_containers_hierarchy h inner join os_storage_containers a on a.identifier = h.ancestor_id where a.activity_status != 'Disabled' group by h.descendent_id;

changeSet.author: nmarwaha
changeSet.sql: create or replace view os_container_hierarchy_view as ( select h.descendent_id as container_id, LISTAGG(a.name, '->') within group( order by a.identifier) as hierarchy from os_containers_hierarchy h inner join os_storage_containers a on a.identifier = h.ancestor_id where a.activity_status != 'Disabled' group by h.descendent_id )
